description: This file defines multiple data transfer object (DTO) records used in the backend of the DevDiary platform, primarily for API request and response payloads related to user authentication, logs, summaries, integration, activities, and analytics.

classes.name: RegisterRequest
classes.description: DTO for user registration request containing email, display name, and password.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: DTO for user login request containing email and password.

classes.name: UserProfileResponse
classes.description: DTO for user profile information including id, email, displayName, and active status.

classes.name: CreateLogEntryRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a log entry with content, category, and tags.

classes.name: LogEntryResponse
classes.description: DTO for log entry data including id, content, category, tags, and creation timestamp.

classes.name: SummaryRequest
classes.description: DTO for requesting a summary for a specific date.

classes.name: SummaryResponse
classes.description: DTO for the summary content for a specific date.

classes.name: IntegrationResponse
classes.description: DTO for external integration details including id, key, name, and description.

classes.name: ConnectIntegrationRequest
classes.description: DTO for connecting to an external service with key and configuration JSON.

classes.name: ActivityEventResponse
classes.description: DTO for activity event details including id, type, details, and timestamp.

classes.name: AnalyticsDailyResponse
classes.description: DTO summarizing daily analytics including date, entries count, commits, pull requests, and meetings.

classes.name: PagedResponse
classes.description: Generic DTO for paginated responses containing items, pagination info, and total counts.
